subject: Greetings
body:
Greetings
I am Maria Elisabeth Schaeffler, a prominent figure in the German business
world, known for my roles as an investor, philanthropist and CEO of
Schaeffler Group Limited. I spend 25 percent of my personal wealth on
charity and have committed to donating the remaining 25% to private
individuals in 2024.

We are pleased to announce that you have been selected for a generous
donation of EUR 1,700,000.00. If you are interested in accepting this
donation, please reply for further details.
Email: [schaefflermariaelisabeth85@gmail.com]
Best regards,
Maria Elisabeth Schaeffler
CEO SCHAEFFLER
